title: Minutes Show Most Fed Officials Expect Additional Rate Cuts
description: Minutes of the Dec. 9-10 Federal Open Market Committee meeting showed most officials see additional interest rate cuts as appropriate if inflation declines over time as expected. Tyler Kendall reports on Bloomberg Television. (Source: Bloomberg)
